      @ParameterizedTest @CsvSource({"DRAGONS, 3","UNICORNS, 5"}) public void moveStudentToIslandTest(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan clan, int islandIndex)
      test checks if the student is correctly removed from the player's hall and added to the given island
      Parameters:
      clan - it is the clan of belonging of the students on which we are going to test the method
      islandIndex - index of the island where to add a student

    • updateProfessorsTest

      @ParameterizedTest @MethodSource("updateProfessorArguments") public void updateProfessorsTest(List<Map<it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan,Integer>> students, Map<it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan,Integer> expectedIndexPlayersProfessors)
      method updateProfessorsTest tests if the professors are updated as expected after adding students to the players' chambers
      Parameters:
      students - students to add to the chamber to set the initial conditions
      expectedIndexPlayersProfessors - indices of players who own a professor from a particular clan

    • changeStateToMotherMovingTest

      @ParameterizedTest @CsvSource({"DRAGONS, 3","FAIRIES, 8"}) public void changeStateToMotherMovingTest(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan clan, int islandIndex)
      test verifies that the method moveStudentToIsland changes turnState to MOTHER_MOVING after the correct number of students have been moved and verifies that an additional attempt to call the method will result in a WrongTurnPhaseException thrown
      Parameters:
      clan - it is the clan of belonging of the students on which we are going to test the method
      islandIndex - index of the island where to move a student

    • updateInfluenceTest

      @ParameterizedTest @CsvSource({"3, 5, 4","0, 11, 10"}) public void updateInfluenceTest(int indexFirstIsland, int indexSecondIsland, int indexThirdIsland)
      test checks if method updateInfluence behaves as expected in a normal situation and on a "limit of array" situation
      Parameters:
      indexFirstIsland - index of the first island conquered
      indexSecondIsland - index of the second island conquered
      indexThirdIsland - index of the third island conquered

    • updateInfluenceTieTest

      @ParameterizedTest @MethodSource("updateInfluenceTieArguments") public void updateInfluenceTieTest(int islandIndex1, int islandIndex2, int islandIndex3, Map<it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan,Integer> islandStudents, Map<it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan,Integer> initialProfessorsIndex)
      test checks if method updateInfluence behaves as expected in case of a tie, not changing the controllingPlayer of the island
      Parameters:
      islandIndex1 - index of the first conquered island
      islandIndex2 - index of the second conquered island
      islandIndex3 - index of the third conquered island
      islandStudents - students to add to the island
      initialProfessorsIndex - indices of players who own a professor from a particular clan

    • chooseCloudTest

      @ParameterizedTest @CsvSource({"2, 0","3, 1"}) public void chooseCloudTest(int numOfPlayers, int cloudIndex)
      test check if chooseCloud method behaves as expected in a normal situation, on both 2 and 3 players game.
      Parameters:
      numOfPlayers - number of players of the game
      cloudIndex - index of the chosen cloud

    • chooseAlreadyPickedCloudTest

      @ParameterizedTest @CsvSource({"2, 0","3, 1"}) public void chooseAlreadyPickedCloudTest(int numOfPlayers, int cloudIndex)
      test check if chooseCloud method behaves as expected when the chosen cloud has already been picked test both the two-player and three-player game the method is expected to throw a NotValidMoveException
      Parameters:
      numOfPlayers - number of players of the game
      cloudIndex - index of the chosen cloud
